issue.title: [Rust] Remove un-needed dev-dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9527](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9527). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently have some dev-dependencies that are not needed. Let's remove them
